Comment on Fashion Flash Giveaway with Peace & Love necklaces by Nancy L..
Fashion Flash Giveaway with Peace & Love necklaces November 21, 2017 Fashion Flash, our weekly emagazine, often hosts giveaways on the blogs that are part of this great group. This time it’s a romantic giveaway and it’s Beauty Info Zone’s turn. This is a two prong giveaway with a romance novel by a New York Times bestselling author and a necklace from Nancy Davis, owner of Peace & Love jewelry. Each of the two winners will receive two prizes that I’m sure will make your heart happy. Part 1 of the giveaway is a paperback novel by Elizabeth Hoyt, Wicked Intentions . Wicked Intentions by Elizabeth Hoyt From the New York Times bestselling author Elizabeth Hoyt comes the first book in her beloved Maiden Lane series. A MAN CONTROLLED BY HIS DESIRES . . . Infamous for his wild, sensual needs, Lazarus Huntington, Lord Caire, is searching for a savage killer in St. Giles, London’s most notorious slum. Widowed Temperance Dews knows St. Giles like the back of her hand-she’s spent a lifetime caring for its inhabitants at the foundling home her family established. Now that home is at risk . . . A WOMAN HAUNTED BY HER PAST . . . Caire makes a simple offer-in return for Temperance’s help navigating the perilous alleys of St. Giles, he will introduce her to London’s high society so that she can find a benefactor for the home. But Temperance may not be the innocent she seems, and what begins as cold calculation soon falls prey to a passion that neither can control-one that may well destroy them both. A BARGAIN NEITHER COULD REFUSE This is the first book in her 11 book Maiden Lane series and earned 4.5 stars from Romantic Times Book Reviews. It might just start you off on a journey you won’t want to end. Part 2 is a necklace from the wonderful Peace and Love collection by Nancy Davis. As you are reading this the necklaces aren’t even available but you will have the chance to win one of these Black Friday specials in our giveaway. Peace & Love Legacy Sterling Silver White Zircon Charm Pendant w/ 16″ Chain Nancy Davis is going to be on EVINE to share her jewelry on Thursday 11/23 11 p.m. to midnight, and again on Black Friday 11/24 from midnight to 1 a.m, 8 a.m. to 9 a.m. (when the variety of necklaces will be shown), 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. with these necklaces and again from 1 to 2 p.m. and 10 to 11 p.m. Her collection of 16 necklaces will be available on Evine all day for the terrific price of $29.99 (normally priced at $55). I have 2 to give away out of the 16 but I’d still advise you to check these out on Evine since they will make fabulous gifts. They come ready for gift giving in their colorful box so all you need is a bow and a gift card. These have a 16″ inch chain with a 2″ extender. The chain itself is Sterling Silver while the stones are White Zircon and look like diamonds. Peace & Love Black Friday necklaces The Peace & Love necklace choices are the Peace & Love signature peace heart, a dove, an angel, a bumble bee, Fleur de Lis, pineapple, lotus, cross, Tree of Life, Evil Eye, Star of David, olive branch, circle, Hamsa, smiley, and lady bug. So many to choose from! Peace & Love Heart Peace & Love Dove Peace & Love Bee Our winners will receive one paperback copy of Wicked Intentions by Elizabeth Hoyt and one Peace & Love necklace. Our giveaway is open through 12/3/17 at 11:59 p.m. for US only. Our thanks go to the author and Nancy Davis for their generous products being given away to two of you. Good luck and good romance. — Marcia a Rafflecopter giveaway More about Nancy Davis: “Dividing her time between parenthood, philanthropy, activism and design, Nancy Davis has dedicated her life to inspiring hope in the lives of others. Nancy founded the Race to Erase MS, a foundation dedicated to the treatment and cure of multiple sclerosis, a disease she was diagnosed with in the early 90s’. In this she finds peace and love – the inspiration for her jewelry collection.”
